job_tasks.phrase: Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech to pioneer novel educational experiences
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to working with and implementing new generative AI technologies, which falls under the 'Modeling' category, specifically the use of generative techniques.

job_tasks.phrase: envision, code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activities of building and deploying software applications, which is the definition of 'Software Development'.

job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences
job_tasks.justification: This describes the full-stack nature of the software development role, integrating AI components across different layers of the application.

job_tasks.phrase: Own and optimize the entire product lifecycle
job_tasks.justification: Owning the product lifecycle from development to enhancement is a key aspect of software development and product management.

job_tasks.phrase: partnering closely with stakeholders to ensure we're nailing learner needs
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding business needs (learner needs) and aligning technical work with them, which is 'Business Understanding'.
Gathering requirements is a fundamental aspect of understanding business needs and translating them into technical specifications.

job_tasks.phrase: partnering with stakeholders to align development with learner needs
job_tasks.justification: Aligning development efforts with learner needs and stakeholder input is a clear indicator of 'Business Understanding'.

job_tasks.phrase: Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness
job_tasks.justification: Using AI for automation in testing and debugging relates to improving development processes and robustness, aligning with MLOps principles.
This directly points to using AI for operational efficiency in testing, which falls under MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications
job_tasks.justification: Developing and delivering applications, especially those that are user-centric, is a core 'Software Development' task.

soft_skills.phrase: envision, code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications
Own and optimize the entire product lifecycle
Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes designing, developing, and deploying full-stack applications using generative AI. Phrases like 'generative AI tech', 'full-stack applications', and 'end-to-end product lifecycle' strongly align with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
